Name: ihre Geschichte
Notes: In an era of continual violence, Schmidt takes up in her piece 'Her Story' the problem of violence against women, concentrating on the topic of rape in her composition.
Long Description: In einer Zeit andauernder Gewalt greift Mia Schmidt hier das Problem der Gewalt gegen Frauen auf und setzt sich in ihrer Komposition mit dem Thema der Vergewaltigung auseinander.
Short Description: For 4 female parts and a female narrator. In an era of continual violence, Schmidt takes up in her piece 'Her Story' the problem of violence against women, concentrating on the topic of rape in her composition.
